### About the site

In early 2021, I started compiling stats for the [Lichess4545 Ledger](https://www.lichess4545.com/team4545/document/ledger-archive/) in the form of round summary dashboards, which were first published in [Ledger #143](https://www.lichess4545.com/team4545/document/ledger-143/). A few months later, I began to expand these round summary stats into standalone season reports, which I first collated and published in August 2021. Thus this site was born.

####  Recent updates

- Added [team logos gallery](https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/team_logos.html) [Apr '22]
- Published stats for [4545 S29](https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/reports/stats_4545_s29.html) [Mar '22]
- Published stats for LoneWolf S24 ([Open](https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/reports/stats_lwopen_s24.html), [U1800](https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/reports/stats_lwu1800_s24.html))
- Re-designed [homepage](https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/) [Feb '22]
- Improved live standings 
- Published stats for all [Chess960 seasons](https://rahulan-c.github.io/lichess4545-stats/season_stats.html)
- Published article on the estimated global distribution of league players [Jan '22]
- Published stats for 4545 S28
- Site first published [Aug '21]
